title: kOri kOri
sahitya:
kOri kOri ninnu kolicina nAmati kodava tIrppa lEvugA shrI krSNa


anupallavi

  sAramaina nAma smaraNavalla iha saukhyamu lEdugA shrI krSNa


caraNam 1    palumAru nItupai padamulu pADina phalamEmiyuNTatugA 
toli duSkarmamulu tolakajEya nIku trOvainalEtugA shrI krSNa
    caraNam 2    palupApinEnani paTipaTi vEDina pAlimpa lEvugA teliyga 
innALu goliciti nI mahima teTatelta nAyakA shrI krSNa
    caraNam 3    cEtulAra ninu shrngArincina nAtu cintalu tIrppavugA nA 
tappunmanninci nannu kAvu maNTE nA mATTanavvAyagA shrI krSNa
    caraNam 4    anya deivamula nAcarimpamati aNumAtramu rAtugA ninnuvinA 
nannu nenarunci brOva nI kannalEtukA shrI krSNa
    caraNam 5    pAluTaina gOpAla dAsuni pAdanu tIrppalEvugA Elu 
kommani nEnentO jEsina pUjayinta cakkanAyagA shrI krSNa
